Privacy Policy

How and why we use your information
Privacy Policy

Who we share your data with
This Privacy Policy is meant to help you understand what data we collect, why we collect it, and what we do with it.
To process your payments, we share and use your information as described in the section Payment Information .
We collect information in the following ways:
We collect information to provide better Services to all of our users.
We may collect information when you interact with our advertisements and other content on third-party sites or platforms, such as social networking sites.
We may collect other information from you that is not specifically listed here.
We may use any such information in accordance with this Privacy Policy or as otherwise permitted by you.
We share your data with third-party companies who perform services on our behalf, like messaging, communication, marketing and advertising services, email and hosting services, and customer services and support.
We will only use, disclose and otherwise process your information for the purposes set forth in this Policy.
When you use our Services or view content provided by Dreamaker, we automatically collect and store certain information in server logs.
As part of our use of third-party analytics tools like Google Analytics and data enrichment services like Heap, we share certain de-identified data as needed.
As indicated above however, we will retain a backup copy of your records as required by law or for legitimate business purposes.

Our Services uses cookies.
This information includes: cookies that may uniquely identify your browser.
We collect information about the functionalities that you use and how you use them, like when you watch a video, visit a page or add a comment.
We use both session-based and persistent cookies.

When you make a purchase on the Services, any credit card information you provide as part of your Payment Information is processed and collected directly by our payment processor Stripe through their Stripe Checkout service.

We use this information to communicate with you in a more effective and customized manner.
